Lunarpine stood tall in his robot mode holding the vial of the alleged
antivirus. Two of Veratis' drones hovered next to him one on each side.
Claws extended from each one trying to look intimidateing. Lunarpine knew
that the only way the drones would have time to do any damage is if the
opponent was pinned down. It was to his advantage that the Predacons didn't
know that. All scans would show that they weren't designed for combat but if
the Preds were anxious to be a nuiscance then he'd be equally as annoying.
"You want the cure?" The former Maximal paused a dramatic pause. "Come out
and get it."
----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 18, 2001 8:55 PM
Subject: Re: A dragon in the lair: Lunarpine.
